Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Vase with a spherical body and a wide, moderately high neck. Made without the aid of a potter's wheel, there is a decorative pattern in two horizontal registers. The top register displays two animals, possibly giraffes, while the lower register show a geometric pattern that forms two friezes of overlapping diamonds.  A motif reminiscent of basketwork.
